mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REGULAR_TRANSFER ( from_account, to_account, description, percentage, amount, ratio, user_id ) VALUES ( #{fromAccount}, #{toAccount}, #{description}, #{percentage}, #{amount}, #{ratio}, #{userId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE REGULAR_TRANSFER SET from_account = CASE WHEN from_account = #{accountId} THEN NULL ELSE from_account END, to_account = CASE WHEN to_account = #{accountId} THEN NULL ELSE to_account END WHERE from_account = #{accountId} OR to_account = #{accountId};
